name: French Onion Soup
description: A classic French soup made with caramelized onions, beef broth, and a crouton topped with Gruyere cheese.

name: Bisque
description: A creamy seafood soup, typically made from lobster or crab.

name: Soupe à l'oignon Gratinée
description: A variation of Soupe à l'oignon where a toast is put on the surface of the soup and then the grated Gruyère cheese is added on top and broiled.

name: Soupe de poisson
description: Fish soup, commonly served in the coastal regions of France.

name: Potage
description: A thick vegetable soup, can be made with a variety of vegetables and served with croutons.

name: Soupe De Potiron
description: A pumpkin soup, which is very popular in the fall season.
